commercialVehicles.title: Find Your Commercial Vehicle
commercialVehicles.subtitle: Browse by category - Click to explore

popularCarBrands.title: Popular Car Brands
popularCarBrands.subtitle: Find your dream car from top manufacturers worldwide

hero.tagline: Buying, selling, financing or leasing a vehicle?
hero.taglineSuffix: Or looking for a brand-new one? VehicleMarket!
hero.description: Discover everything related to vehicles on VehicleMarket and easily get a clear overview of the entire automotive market. Over 1.4 million vehicles are waiting for you every day.
hero.searchPlaceholder: Search by brand or model (e.g., DAF, Volvo, FH 540)...

marketplace.title: VehicleMarket – Your Complete Vehicle Marketplace

buy.title: Looking to Buy a Vehicle?
buy.description: Explore our wide range of offers, compare them, and contact sellers directly – whether professional dealers or private sellers. Find cars, commercial vehicles, motorcycles, e-bikes, and caravans with quality seals and warranties.

sell.title: Looking to Sell Your Vehicle?
sell.description: Sell your vehicle here free of charge – quickly and conveniently. Reach millions of potential buyers at the best possible price. Create your listing in minutes and start receiving offers today.

finance.title: Financing & Leasing Options
finance.description: Whether buying or leasing, find what you're looking for. Discover suitable financing offers and leasing deals from dealers near you. Compare monthly instalments and get the best deal for your budget.

marketplace.tipDescription: With a customer account, you'll always stay up to date. Save your searches, access your saved vehicles from all your devices, and receive the latest offers matching your preferences.

aiFeatures.title: AI-Powered Smart Features
aiFeatures.subtitle: Experience the future of vehicle shopping with our intelligent AI assistant

chatbot.title: AI Chatbot Assistant
chatbot.description: Chat with our AI to find the perfect truck. Ask in plain language!

smartSearch.title: Smart Search
smartSearch.description: Search using natural language like "Mercedes Euro 6 low mileage"

priceEstimation.title: AI Price Estimation
priceEstimation.description: Get instant AI-powered price analysis and fair market values

marketInsights.title: Market Insights
marketInsights.description: View real-time market trends and analytics powered by AI

satisfaction.question: How satisfied are you with the homepage?
satisfaction.thankYou: Thank you for your feedback! Your opinion helps us improve.
